data.name: Puryear Custom Pools
data.address: 2200 Cantrell Sansom Rd, Fort Worth, TX 76131

reviews.text: 2200 Cantrell Sansom Rd, Fort Worth, TX 76131 This is the standpipe for the overflow unit that they claim was dislodged yet was never installed. Still sitting in a box with the skimmer baskets.
Reviews are automatically processed to detect inappropriate content like fake reviews and spam. We may take down reviews that are flagged in order to comply with Google policies or legal obligations.

"I work in customer service and this company epitomizes top notch service." "Axel came to service the pool equipment he is a very polite gentleman." "Very good experience from the start to finish to maintenance services

Puryear Custom Pools (PCP) from the get-go, listened to what we wanted and delivered where other companies designed what they wanted to instead.  Our goal was to add a pool/spa to our backyard and for it to be the centerpiece while the … More

Review update at ONE YEAR OF OPEN POOL SEASON: I have had a few problems with everything working properly, but not ONE time has Puryear failed to come out, and they continued to come back as many times as … More Response from the owner a year ago Thank you for the review! Looking forward to seeing your beautiful project completed.

We had a large backyard/pool remodel that broke ground 11/2023, and was slated to be completed in approximately 3-4 months. It was complex, and we picked this contractor because he assured us “my pencil is SHARP” and he would get things … More
